sig_info: Yondu’s high-octave vocal range gives him precise control over his yaka arrows. Enemies activating a Special Attack suffer Weakness for each Debuff effect they’re suffering from at the time of the activation, reducing Attack by 15 to 30.01% for 5 seconds.

YAKA ARROW: Yondu utilizes his Yaka Arrow during his first and third Light Attack as well as during his Heavy and Special Attacks. These attacks have +339.39 Armor and Block Penetration as well as the following:
40% chance to inflict a Bleed Debuff dealing 83 damage over 7 seconds.
Against Bleed Immune opponents, instead have a 40% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, removing 1 Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by 282.35 for 9 seconds.
The strength and precision of Yondu’s Yaka Arrow allow it to trigger Critical Hits and personal Abilities through the opponent’s Block.
ALL ATTACKS: 25% chance to Pilfer 1 Armor Up Buff. {3}% chance to Pilfer 1 Prowess effect. For each Prowess or Armor Up Pilfered, gain an Armor Up Buff, granting +1066.67 Armor Rating for 15 seconds.
ALWAYS ACTIVE: Opponent suffers -10% Combat Power Rate for each Debuff on them. Max: -50%.
HEAVY ATTACKS: +50% Offensive Ability Accuracy for this attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: +100% Offensive Ability Accuracy for this attack.
100% chance to inflict a Heal Block Debuff lasting 12 seconds. If the opponent is Regenerating, instead inflict a 25 second Debuff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: +339.39 Block Penetration
For each Special Attack the opponent has launched this fight, gain a Passive Fury, granting +24.9 Attack Rating for 14 seconds. Max: {3}.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to gain a Precision Buff, increasing Critical Rating by +533.33 for 20 seconds.
100% chance to inflict an indefinite, non-stacking Passive Special Concussion, reducing Ability Accuracy during Special Attacks by 100% until the end of the opponent’s next Special Attack.
